page.title: 16RECENT HISTORY
page.content: The development of the area began in the 1930's when Kinmel Bay was described as "{THE GARDEN CITY OF THE {WELSH RIVIERA"}The {KINMEL BAY ESTATES {Ltd }offered properties for sale as either seaside homes,poultry farm units or fruit farmlets.These properties cost between {Â£250 }and{ {Â£400 }and could be secured by a Â£25 deposit,the balance being paid over 14 years.The plans for this Garden village never materialised due to the onset of{WORLD WAR 2}and also the mysterious demise of the Kinmel Bay Estates Ltd the exact details of which have still not come to light.
